body.p: If, and only if, it is impracticable for an entity to apply paragraph C4(aa) for an asset for insurance acquisition cash flows, the entity shall apply the following approaches to measure the asset for insurance acquisition cash flows:

li.p: the modified retrospective approach in paragraphs C14B–C14D and C17A, subject to paragraph C6(a); or
the fair value approach in paragraphs C24A–C24B.
